Jack Treado

Jack (John D.) Treado

PhD Candidate - Mechanical Engineering & Materials Science, Yale University

I am currently a graduate student in Corey O’Hern’s group at Yale. I study collective cell motion, tissue organization and tissue mechanics using mostly computational tools.

I also go by Jack, but publish by my given name (John. D Treado). Sorry for any confusion!

For any inquiries, please email me at john.treado@yale.edu.
